title: American-style jumbo chocolate chip muffins
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '125g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '150ml semi-skimmed milk', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 medium egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 teaspoon chocolate extract', '100g dark or milk chocolate chips']
